name: GrooveAlly for Infusionsoft
author: AmbitionAlly

sections.description:
GrooveAlly for Infusionsoft creates a valuable integration that will allow Infusionsoft information to appear inside a Groove contact’s profile.

This is extremely beneficial in customer service situations. Whenever someone sends you an email, you can see exactly which Infusionsoft tags they have. There is also a link that goes directly to their Infusionsoft profile, enabling you to look a little deeper into their account quickly and efficiently.

This Groove-Infusionsoft integration can maximize the efficiency of your customer service by eliminating much of the search time associated with product-related questions.

With the integration, answering questions is so much simpler….and you’ll have a much easier time connecting them with other services that might be a good fit.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->GrooveAlly screen in WordPress to configure the plugin
  4. Add the API for both Groove and Infusionsoft
  5. Inside your Groove Account, setup the Custom Profile with the following HTML code and hook URL.
  6. Send a test email to confirm that the plugin is properly configured. If there is an error, check the HTML code and Hook URL for discrepancies.
sections.faq:
Where Can I Get Help For Setting Up The Plugin?

Because this is a free plugin, we do not offer support. For more detailed setup information, please visit our page: http://ambitionally.com/grooveally-for-infusionsoft/grooveally-tutorial/

short_description: This plugin creates a helpful integration between Groove and Infusionsoft by updating the user profile in Groove with custom Infusionsoft data.
